hudson.triggers.TimerTrigger.spec: # quarterly Feb May Aug Nov #H H 12 2,5,8,11 * # 7 days after Wikimedia Dump (5+7=12)

hudson.tasks.Shell.command: cd /var/www/html/eol_php8_code/update_resources/connectors # === just a utility #these 3 is just for stats = generates 3 reports php filter_term_group_by_taxa.php jenkins '{"source": "617_ENV", "target":"wikipedia_en_traits_FTG", "taxonIDs": "Q1357", "habitat_filter": "saline water"}' php filter_term_group_by_taxa.php jenkins '{"source": "617_ENV", "target":"wikipedia_en_traits_FTG", "taxonIDs": "Q1390", "habitat_filter": "saline water"}' php filter_term_group_by_taxa.php jenkins '{"source": "617_ENV", "target":"wikipedia_en_traits_FTG", "taxonIDs": "Q10908", "habitat_filter": "saline water"}'
